features.name: Daily Fortune (오늘의 운세)
features.description: Daily fortune telling based on Korean Saju with category scores for love, money, health, work, and study

features.name: Traditional Saju (전통 사주)
features.description: Traditional Korean fortune telling based on birth date and time with Four Pillars analysis

features.name: Tarot Reading (타로)
features.description: Interactive tarot card reading with multiple spreads and AI interpretation

features.name: Compatibility (궁합)
features.description: Compatibility analysis between two people based on their birth information

features.name: MBTI Fortune
features.description: Fortune telling combined with MBTI personality types

features.name: Health Fortune (건강운)
features.description: Health-focused fortune with body part analysis and recommendations

features.name: Dream Interpretation (해몽)
features.description: AI-powered dream interpretation with voice input support

features.name: Face Reading (관상)
features.description: AI-powered face reading analysis using camera

features.name: Talisman (부적)
features.description: Digital talisman generation for protection and luck

features.name: Celebrity Fortune (연예인 사주)
features.description: Fortune analysis of celebrities for comparison

features.name: Love Fortune (연애운)
features.description: Detailed love and relationship fortune analysis

features.name: Token Purchase (토큰 구매)
features.description: In-app purchase system for fortune tokens

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Social login with Apple, Google, Kakao

features.name: Onboarding
features.description: User onboarding flow with birth date input

features.name: Fortune History
features.description: History of past fortune readings with calendar view

features.name: Settings
features.description: App settings including notifications and font customization
